articles.title: Xbox Cloud Gaming coming to Meta Quest headsets in December - Eurogamer.net
articles.description: Xbox Cloud Gaming will be available on Meta Quest headsets in December. Microsoft and Meta announced their partnership …
articles.content:
Xbox Cloud Gaming will be available on Meta Quest headsets in December.
Microsoft and Meta announced their partnership a year ago, but now we finally know when Xbox games will be available on the VR… [+1002 chars]
